tit.j: アートコンプレックス1928

sen.j: アートコンプレックス1928(ART COMPLEX 1928)は京都市中京区の旧毎日新聞社京都支局（現1928ビル）3階にある小劇場。
sen.e: ART COMPLEX 1928 is a small theater located on the third floor of the former Kyoto branch office of The Mainich Newspapers (present 1928 building) in Nakagyo Ward, Kyoto City.
ART COMPLEX 1928 is a small theater located on the third floor of the former Kyoto branch office of The Mainich Newspaper (present 1928 building) in Nakagyo Ward, Kyoto City.
ART COMPLEX 1928 is a small theater located on the third floor of the former Kyoto branch office of The Mainichi Newspaper (present 1928 building) in Nakagyo-ku Ward, Kyoto City.

sen.j: 高さ5メートルのアーチ型の天井で、講堂風の舞台。
sen.e: It is provided with a 5 m-high arch ceiling and an auditorium-like stage.
It is provided with a 5 m-high arch ceiling and an auditorium-like stage.
It is provided with a 5 m-high arch ceiling and an auditorium-like stage.

sen.j: アートコンプレックス1928の名前は、芝居、音楽、ダンス、など様々なジャンル、芸術性、エンターテイメント性をコンプレックス（複合）したものを発信していきたいということから。
sen.e: The name of ART COMPLEX 1928 is used intending to generate and spread complex products of various art genres, such as play, music and dance, various artistic characteristics and various entertainment characteristics.
The name of ART COMPLEX 1928 is used intending to generate and spread complex products of various art genres, such as plays, music and dance, various artistic and entertainment characteristics.
The name of ART COMPLEX 1928 is used intending to generate and spread complex products of various art genres, such as plays, music and dance, various artistic and entertainment characteristics.

sen.j: 1999年にオープンし、エンジェルシステム、ファンドを導入したロングラン公演などの主催公演をおこなうなど意欲的に活動を続けている。
sen.e: It opened in 1999, and ambitious activities, for example, of hosting a long-run performance where an angel system/fund was introduced, have been conducted there.
It opened in 1999, and ambitious activities, for example; the hosting of a long-run performance where an angel system/fund was introduced, has been conducted there.
It opened in 1999, and ambitious activities, for example; the hosting of a long-run performance where an angel system or fund was introduced, has been conducted there.
The maximum number of seats is slightly more than 200.
The maximum number of seats is slightly more than 200.
The maximum number of seats is slightly more than 200.

sen.j: 阪急電車河原町駅9番出口より北へ徒歩8分
sen.e: Hankyu Railway: eight minutes on foot from exit 9 of Kawaramachi Station
Hankyu Railway: eight minutes on foot from exit 9 of Kawaramachi Station
Hankyu Railway: Eight minutes on foot to the north from exit 9 of Kawaramachi Station

sen.j: 京阪電車三条駅6番出口より西へ徒歩5分
sen.e: Keihan Electric Railway: five minutes on foot from exit 6 of Sanjo Station
Keihan Electric Railway: five minutes on foot from exit 6 of Sanjo Station
Keihan Electric Railway: Five minutes on foot to the west from exit 6 of Sanjo Station

sen.j: 地下鉄東西線烏丸線 御池駅5番出口より東へ徒歩10分
sen.e: The Karasuma Line of Kyoto City subway: ten minutes on foot from exit 5 of Oike Station
The Karasuma Line of Kyoto City subway: ten minutes on foot from exit 5 of Oike Station
The Tozai Line and the Karasuma Line of Kyoto City Subway: Ten minutes on foot to the east from exit 5 of Oike Station
